means: 摆设酒宴者，饮酒狂欢者( reveler的名词复数 )

sentence.Network_en: The revelers drank tequila from shot glasses at the bar.
sentence.Network_cn: 纵酒狂欢的人在酒吧畅饮龙舌兰酒.

sentence.Network_en: A year ago, those nightclubs were packed with revelers.
sentence.Network_cn: 一年以前, 那些夜总会总是人满为患.

sentence.Network_en: The clubs attract revelers as young as thirteen.
sentence.Network_cn: 俱乐部吸引了大批狂欢者,最年轻的才13岁.
